resources.string: Does this appear to be the product you were searching for?

You will need two API keys to sign up. The first is for the food database. Click the link below. Under "Gaining Access", click "Sign up now". Fill out the form and your login key (API key) will be emailed to you. Copy and paste your key below
The second key is for barcode searches. Click the link below. Fill out the form. Under "Your Menu", click "API Key". Copy and paste your key below
